T02TD1223E:23a-4: dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1223E:23a-5: dpal ldan dgyes pa'i rdo rje dang //
T02TD1223E:23a-6: bdag med ma gus phyag byas te //
T02TD1223E:23a-7: rdo rje slob dpon bka' drin gyis //
T02TD1223E:23a-8: sbyin sreg cho ga bshad par bya //
T02TD1223E:23a-9: bdag gzhan phan par 'dod pa yis //
T02TD1223E:23a-10: rnam rtog nga rgyal sogs spangs te //
T02TD1223E:23a-11: chos phyir 'brang ba'i blo yis ni //
T02TD1223E:23a-12: sbyin sreg rim pa mnyan par gyis //
T02TD1223E:23a-13: bla med nang dang phyi rol te //
T02TD1223E:23a-14: sbyin sreg dbye ba rnam pa gsum //
T02TD1223E:23a-15: ye shes me lha phung po sogs //
T02TD1223E:23a-16: bud shing bsreg pa bla med yin //
T02TD1223E:23a-17: phyi rol sbyin sreg gis bsgres te //
T02TD1223E:23a-18: kha zas bza' sogs nang gir bshad //
T02TD1223E:23a-19: dkyil 'khor dang ni lha gnas dang //
T02TD1223E:23a-20: sgrub pa'i dus su sbyin sreg bya //
T02TD1223E:23a-21: sbyin sreg las rnams med pa la//
T02TD1223E:23a-23: las rnams thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02TD1223E:23a-24: mkhas pas sbyin sreg las rnams brtsam //
T02TD1223E:23a-25: sdig pa 'jig phyir zhi ba ste //
T02TD1223E:23a-26: bsod nams yongs 'dzin rgyas pa yin //
T02TD1223E:23a-27: chags pa bsgom phyir dbang 'gyur te //
T02TD1223E:23a-28: rtog pa zad phyir gsod pa yin //
T02TD1223E:23b-0: nyon @23b mongs ser ba zhi byed dang //
T02TD1223E:23b-1: ting nge 'dzin ni rgyas byed phyir //
T02TD1223E:23b-2: rang gi lha yi sbyor bas bdag / ji lta bar ni sems kyis bya //
T02TD1223E:23b-3: de nas phyi yi bshad bya ste //
T02TD1223E:23b-4: thab dang rdzas kyi mtshan nyid dang //
T02TD1223E:23b-5: sgrub pa po dang lha dag dang //
T02TD1223E:23b-6: sgrub pa'i thabs dang rnam lngar 'gyur //
T02TD1223E:23b-7: de la thab khung bshad pa ni //
T02TD1223E:23b-8: sems can dbye bas mtha' yas te //
T02TD1223E:23b-9: las kyi dbye bas bzhi ru 'gyur //
T02TD1223E:23b-10: rigs kyi dbye bas lnga ru 'gyur //
T02TD1223E:23b-11: zhi ba la ni zlum po ste //
T02TD1223E:23b-12: rgyas pa la ni gru bzhi'o //
T02TD1223E:23b-13: dbang la gzhu yi dbyibs su'o //
T02TD1223E:23b-14: mngon spyod la ni gru gsum mo //
T02TD1223E:23b-15: bskrad dang dgug la'ang de bzhin no //
T02TD1223E:23b-16: rgya ru khru gang zabs su ni //
T02TD1223E:23b-17: mtho gang pa ni zhi ba yin //
T02TD1223E:23b-18: rgya ru khru do zabs su ni //
T02TD1223E:23b-19: khru gang pa ni rgyas par bzhed //
T02TD1223E:23b-20: rgya ru khru gang zabs su ni //
T02TD1223E:23b-21: mtho gang pa ni dbang la'o //
T02TD1223E:23b-22: rgya ru sor mo nyi shu la //
T02TD1223E:23b-23: zabs su sor bcu mngon spyod la //
T02TD1223E:23b-24: bskrad dang dgug la'ang de bzhin no //
T02TD1223E:23b-25: zhi la kha dog dkar por bya //
T02TD1223E:23b-26: rgyas pa la ni ser po'o //
T02TD1223E:23b-27: dbang la dmar por bya ba'o //
T02TD1223E:23b-28: mngon spyod la ni nag po'o //
T02TD1223E:23b-29: dgug pa la ni dmar por bya //
T02TD1223E:23b-30: bskrad pa la ni nag por bya'o //
T02TD1223E:23b-31: zhi la kha khyer sor bzhis bskor //
T02TD1223E:23b-32: nang du'ang sor bzhi dor bar bya //
T02TD1223E:23b-33: rgyas pa la ni sor brgyad de //
T02TD1223E:23b-34: nang du'ang de bzhin dor bar bya //
T02TD1223E:23b-35: dbang la kha khyer sor bzhis bskor //
T02TD1223E:23b-36: nang du'ang sor bzhi dor bar bya //
T02TD1223E:23b-37: mngon spyod la ni sor gsum ste //
T02TD1223E:23b-38: nang du'ang sor gsum dor bar bya //
T02TD1223E:23b-39: dgug dang bskrad la'ang de bzhin no //
T02TD1223E:23b-40: zhi ba'i thab khung dbus su ni //
T02TD1223E:23b-41: rdo rje dang ni gri gug bri //
T02TD1223E:23b-42: kha khyer la ni rdo rjes bskor //
T02TD1223E:23b-43: rgyas la dbus su rin po che'o //
T02TD1223E:23b-44: kha khyer la'ang rin po che'o //
T02TD1223E:23b-45: dbang la dbus su padmas mtshan //
T02TD1223E:23b-46: kha khyer de dang 'dra bas bskor //
T02TD1223E:23b-47: mngon spyod la ni ral gri'o //
T02TD1223E:23b-48: kha khyer la yang ral gris bskor //
T02TD1223E:23b-49: dgug la dbus su lcags kyu bzhag //
T02TD1223E:23b-50: kha khyer de dang 'dra bas bskor //
T02TD1223E:23b-51: bskrad la dbus su rdo rje ni //
T02TD1223E:23b-52: rtse gsum pa ni gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD1223E:23b-53: kha khyer la yang rtse gsum bri //
T02TD1223E:23b-54: dbus su gri gug kun la mthun //
T02TD1223E:23b-55: thab khung nang gi phyogs bzhir ni //
T02TD1223E:23b-56: kha tv'am ga dang bde gshegs kyi //
T02TD1223E:23b-57: phyag mtshan phyi ma rim bzhin gzhag / thab khung kun la kha dog dang //
T02TD1223E:23b-58: mthun pa'i dri yis byug par bya //
T02TD1223E:24a-2: rgyas pa snga dro bya ba yin //
T02TD1223E:24a-3: dbang ni dgongs ka'i dus su bya //
T02TD1223E:24a-4: dgug pa la yang de dang 'dra //
T02TD1223E:24a-5: mngon spyod na ma phyed nyin phyed bya //
T02TD1223E:24a-6: bskrad pa'ang de dang 'dra ba yin //
T02TD1223E:24a-7: zhi ba shar du bya bar bshad //
T02TD1223E:24a-8: rgyas pa lho yi phyogs su bya //
T02TD1223E:24a-9: dbang gi las ni nub tu bya //
T02TD1223E:24a-10: dgug la'ang nub tu bya ba yin //
T02TD1223E:24a-11: mngon spyod byang du brtsam par bya //
T02TD1223E:24a-12: bskrad pa'i las kyang de dang 'dra //
T02TD1223E:24a-13: tshon gyis rjes mthun bri ba'am //
T02TD1223E:24a-14: yang na me tog dag kyang rung //
T02TD1223E:24a-15: thab khung dag ni de ltar bya //
T02TD1223E:24a-16: rdzas ni 'di ltar shes par bya //
T02TD1223E:24a-17: zhi ba la ni til gyis so //
T02TD1223E:24a-18: rgyas pa la ni zho zan no //
T02TD1223E:24a-20: mngon spyod la ni tsher mas so //
T02TD1223E:24a-21: bskrad pa la yang tsher ma'o //
T02TD1223E:24a-22: kun la mthun pa 'di dag ste //
T02TD1223E:24a-23: mchod yon dang ni zhabs bsil dang //
T02TD1223E:24a-24: bsang gtor dri dang byug pa dang //
T02TD1223E:24a-25: me tog mar me til dang ni //
T02TD1223E:24a-26: yam shing mar dang zho zan dang //
T02TD1223E:24a-27: ku sha d'ur ba'i myu gu nas//
T02TD1223E:24a-28: gro dang 'bru dang ma sha dang //
T02TD1223E:24a-29: ma grugs 'bras dang rta sga dang //
T02TD1223E:24a-30: gla gor sho sha dz'a ti pa la //
T02TD1223E:24a-31: gzhan yang zhu ba'i rdzas rnams dang //
T02TD1223E:24a-32: bdud rtsi me dang bud shing ngo //
T02TD1223E:24a-33: mngon spyod la ni bsgrub bya yi //
T02TD1223E:24a-34: gzugs brnyan ske tshe lan tshva dang //
T02TD1223E:24a-35: khrag dang mi rus phye ma dang //
T02TD1223E:24a-36: dug dang dpa' bo lnga rnams so ;
T02TD1223E:24a-37: / au dumw'a ra la sogs pa'i //
T02TD1223E:24a-38: yal ga rtse mo'i cha las byung //
T02TD1223E:24a-39: srid du mdzub gang sbom mthe bo'i //
T02TD1223E:24a-40: dpangs tsam sbrang rtsi 'o ma dang //
T02TD1223E:24a-41: tsandan dkar po'i chu la spangs //
T02TD1223E:24a-42: rtse gcig zhi la ro rgyas ni //
T02TD1223E:24a-43: yal ga dbus kyi cha las byung //
T02TD1223E:24a-44: srid du khru gang sboms su ni /
T02TD1223E:24a-45: mthe bo mthe'u chung bar khengs pa //
T02TD1223E:24a-46: zho dang mar dang ser po dri //
T02TD1223E:24a-47: de la spangs te rtse gcig pas //
T02TD1223E:24a-48: dbul bya mkhas pas dbang la ni //
T02TD1223E:24a-49: tsandan dmar dang yungs dmar la //
T02TD1223E:24a-50: spangs pa tshad ni zhi dang mthun //
T02TD1223E:24a-51: drag po la ni tsher ma'i shing //
T02TD1223E:24a-52: rtsa ba'i cha las byung ba ni //
T02TD1223E:24a-53: srid du sor bcu sboms su ni //
T02TD1223E:24a-54: phra dang sbom pa'ang dbul bar bya //
T02TD1223E:24a-55: khrag dang dug dang lan tshva dang //
T02TD1223E:24a-56: tshva ba'i dri la spangs pa'o //
T02TD1223E:24a-57: bskrad dang dgug pa'ang de bzhin no //
T02TD1223E:24a-58: ring dang thung dang gas dang phra //
T02TD1223E:24a-59: srog chags bcas sogs spang bar bya //
T02TD1223E:24a-60: au dumw'a ra la sogs pa'i //
T02TD1223E:24a-61: mngar ba'i ro dang 'o mar bcas //
T02TD1223E:24b-0: @24b bud shing zhi ba'i las la bya //
T02TD1223E:24b-1: skyur ba'i ror ldan rgyas pa la'o //
T02TD1223E:24b-2: dbang la dmar zhing tsher ma ni //
T02TD1223E:24b-3: lcags kyu lta bu yod pa'o //
T02TD1223E:24b-4: dgug pa la yang de bzhin no //
T02TD1223E:24b-5: drag po la ni kha ba dang //
T02TD1223E:24b-6: tsha ba'i ror ldan tsher mar bcas //
T02TD1223E:24b-7: bskrad pa la yang de bzhin no //
T02TD1223E:24b-8: ring thung kha dog la sogs pa //
T02TD1223E:24b-9: ci rigs pas ni bud shing bya //
T02TD1223E:24b-10: mchod yon la sogs snod rnams ni //
T02TD1223E:24b-11: zhi ba la sogs las rim bzhin //
T02TD1223E:24b-12: dngul dang gser dang zangs ma dang //
T02TD1223E:24b-13: lcags la sogs pas byas pa yin //
T02TD1223E:24b-14: dgang gzar byugs gzar yu ba khru //
T02TD1223E:24b-15: 'og tu rdo rje rin chen bya //
T02TD1223E:24b-16: de steng rgyar ni sor bzhi la //
T02TD1223E:24b-17: zabs su sor gnyis nang rdo rje //
T02TD1223E:24b-18: sor bzhi'i mthar ni rdo rje ste //
T02TD1223E:24b-20: blugs gzar padma'i dbyibs sor gnyis //
T02TD1223E:24b-21: zabs su sor gcig nang rdo rje //
T02TD1223E:24b-23: rgyun gzhag me'am bram ze ni //
T02TD1223E:24b-24: tha mal me ni zhi ba la'o //
T02TD1223E:24b-25: rgyas pa la ni rgyal po dang //
T02TD1223E:24b-26: rgyal rigs dang ni blon po'i me //
T02TD1223E:24b-27: yang na dgon pa nas byung me'o //
T02TD1223E:24b-28: dbang dang dgug la smad 'tshong ngam //
T02TD1223E:24b-29: rje rigs khyim nas byung mes bya //
T02TD1223E:24b-30: dgug pa la ni gar mkhan dang //
T02TD1223E:24b-31: rol mo pa las byung ba 'am //
T02TD1223E:24b-32: lam du bus pa'i mes bya'o //
T02TD1223E:24b-33: mngon spyod la ni rje bo dang //
T02TD1223E:24b-34: gdol pa'i khyim nas byung bas bya //
T02TD1223E:24b-35: bskrad pa la yang de bzhin no //
T02TD1223E:24b-36: kun la'ang dur khrod me dang ni //
T02TD1223E:24b-37: sol bar ldan pas bya ba'o //
T02TD1223E:24b-38: sbyin sreg yo byad thams cad ni //
T02TD1223E:24b-39: bdag gi g-yas su dgod par bya //
T02TD1223E:24b-40: rdo rje de bzhin dril bu dang //
T02TD1223E:24b-41: mchod yon snod ni g-yon du gzhag / dgang gzar dang ni blugs gzar dang //
T02TD1223E:24b-42: mar ni mdun du gzhag par bya //
T02TD1223E:24b-43: mngon spyod pa ni go bzlog pa'o //
T02TD1223E:24b-44: thams cad kyang ni bsangs nas gzhag / slob dpon dag gam sgrub pa po //
T02TD1223E:24b-45: mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag ldan //
T02TD1223E:24b-46: sbyin sreg las la mkhas pa yis //
T02TD1223E:24b-47: brtson pas sbyin sreg las bya'o //
T02TD1223E:24b-48: 'dir ni lha ni rnam gsum ste //
T02TD1223E:24b-49: bsreg bya len dang las byed dang //
T02TD1223E:24b-50: mchod par bya ba'i me lha ste //
T02TD1223E:24b-51: 'di rnams mtshan nyid gzhan nas gsungs //
T02TD1223E:24b-52: thab kyi rim pa bshad par bya //
T02TD1223E:24b-53: de nas slob dpon de yis ni //
T02TD1223E:25a-0: @25a * // sbyin sreg khang par legs 'dug nas //
T02TD1223E:25a-1: khrus sogs bya ba sngon byas te //
T02TD1223E:25a-2: sgrub thabs las byung cho ga yis //
T02TD1223E:25a-3: las kyi rjes su mthun pa yi //
T02TD1223E:25a-4: lha yi nga rgyal bskyed nas ni //
T02TD1223E:25a-5: rdzas rnams yang dag byin gyis brlab //
T02TD1223E:25a-6: dang por bsang gtor snod la ni//
T02TD1223E:25a-7: gsang sngags 'di ni bzlas byas te //
T02TD1223E:25a-8: aom raksha raksha h'u% h'u% h'u% phat //
T02TD1223E:25a-9: de yis kun la bsang gtor bya //
T02TD1223E:25a-10: de nas mchod yon la sogs la //
T02TD1223E:25a-11: rang rang gsang sngags bzlas pa'am //
T02TD1223E:25a-12: yang na gsang sngags 'di bzlas te //
T02TD1223E:25a-14: thams cad dag par bsam bya ste //
T02TD1223E:25a-15: gong nas 'byung ba'i me blangs la //
T02TD1223E:25a-16: de la rakshas bsang gtor bya //
T02TD1223E:25a-17: thab tu 'ang bsang zhing me bcug la //
T02TD1223E:25a-18: gsang sngags 'di dang bcas pa yi //
T02TD1223E:25a-19: rlung yab kyis ni spar bar bya //
T02TD1223E:25a-20: aom he ru ka ma h'a badzra dzva la h'u% h'u% h'u%/
T02TD1223E:25a-21: de nas bgegs ni bcing bya'i phyir //
T02TD1223E:25a-22: ku sha drungs phyung sngo ba la //
T02TD1223E:25a-23: gsang sngags 'di ni bzlas nas kyang //
T02TD1223E:25a-24: aom badzra satva a'a yu she sv'a h'a //
T02TD1223E:25a-25: shar dang lho dang nub dang byang //
T02TD1223E:25a-26: dbus su'ang legs par dgram par bya //
T02TD1223E:25a-27: de nas legs sbyangs gnas der ni //
T02TD1223E:25a-28: yi ge h'u% las byung ba yi //
T02TD1223E:25a-29: zhi sogs las kyi rjes mthun pa'i //
T02TD1223E:25a-30: thab khung dag ni bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1223E:25a-31: de yi dbus su padma ni ;
T02TD1223E:25a-32: /'dab brgyad pa ni legs dmigs la //
T02TD1223E:25a-33: mngon par byang chub lnga yis ni //
T02TD1223E:25a-34: rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed par bya //
T02TD1223E:25a-35: 'dod chags chen po'i tshul gyis ni //
T02TD1223E:25a-36: rdo rje sems dpa' yongs gyur las //
T02TD1223E:25a-37: ram las byung ba'i me lha bsam //
T02TD1223E:25a-38: zhi ba'i me lha dka' po'o //
T02TD1223E:25a-39: rgyas pa la ni ye shes me //
T02TD1223E:25a-40: dbang dang dgug la 'dod pa'i me //
T02TD1223E:25a-41: mngon spyod las dang bskrad pa la //
T02TD1223E:25a-42: rlung gi me ni mkhas pas bsam //
T02TD1223E:25a-43: zhal gsum phyag drug kha dog dkar //
T02TD1223E:25a-44: mchod phyir thogs la sogs pas brgyan //
T02TD1223E:25a-45: dang pos rig ma yang dag 'khyud //
T02TD1223E:25a-46: g-yas gnyis dbyug to mi 'jigs pa //
T02TD1223E:25a-47: g-yon gnyis bgrang phreng spyi blugs 'dzin //
T02TD1223E:25a-48: rgyas pa de las kha dog ser //
T02TD1223E:25a-49: dbang dang dgug la dmar po la //
T02TD1223E:25a-50: g-yas g-yon gnyis kyi bar pa na //
T02TD1223E:25a-52: gsad dang bskrad dang nag po la //
T02TD1223E:25a-53: dbu skra gyen brdzes za byed lta bu yi //
T02TD1223E:25b-0: @25b sngags dang phyag rgya sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1223E:25b-1: ye shes me lha spyan drang bya //
T02TD1223E:25b-2: g-yas pa mi 'jigs phyag rgya yi //
T02TD1223E:25b-3: mthe bong srin lag mtshams bkug pa'o //
T02TD1223E:25b-4: aom aagna ma h'a te dza sarba k'a martha s'a dha ka /
T02TD1223E:25b-5: ka ru tsu da kri tva sv'a h'a /
T02TD1223E:25b-6: aasmi sanni hi to bha ba /
T02TD1223E:25b-7: me lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya dang sngags so //
T02TD1223E:25b-8: bgegs bskrad bsang gtor la sogs bya //
T02TD1223E:25b-11: dgug dang de bzhin gzhug pa dang //
T02TD1223E:25b-12: bcing dang rjes su dgyes par bya //
T02TD1223E:25b-13: sa tim h'um gatstsha ha bya bhu ka aa ga mi sha si dza ta k'a le sarba sidhi ku ru sha me //
T02TD1223E:25b-15: de nas gnyis med me lha la //
T02TD1223E:25b-16: thugs ka'i sa bon 'od zer gyis //
T02TD1223E:25b-17: de bzhin gshegs rnams bskul byas te //
T02TD1223E:25b-18: bdud rtsi bum pa'i chu yis ni //
T02TD1223E:25b-19: dbang bskur ba ni bya ba'o //
T02TD1223E:25b-20: zhi ba'i me la rnam snang mdzad //
T02TD1223E:25b-21: dbu rgyan du ni bya ba yin //
T02TD1223E:25b-22: rgyas la rin chen 'byung ldan no //
T02TD1223E:25b-23: dbang dang dgug la tshe dpag med //
T02TD1223E:25b-24: gsod sogs las la mi bskyod pa'o //
T02TD1223E:25b-25: de nas rang rang sngags kyis ni //
T02TD1223E:25b-26: bsang gtor mchod yon zhabs bsil dbul //
T02TD1223E:25b-27: de nas me lha'i kha dang ni //
T02TD1223E:25b-28: dgang gzar blugs gzar nang du ni //
T02TD1223E:25b-29: yi ge ra% ni legs bkod de //
T02TD1223E:25b-30: mar gyis yongs su bkang ba yi //
T02TD1223E:25b-31: dgang blugs bdun nam gsum mam gcig / me lha'i sngags kyis dbul bar bya //
T02TD1223E:25b-32: aom he ru ka aagna ye aa mo ka sya sh'antim gu ru sv'a h'a //
T02TD1223E:25b-33: gzhan yang rang rang sngags dang sbyar //
T02TD1223E:25b-34: de nas 'bar ba'i mtshan ma brtag / ngan na bsrung bar bya ba'o //
T02TD1223E:25b-35: de nas legs par me de la //
T02TD1223E:25b-36: mchod pa kun gyis rab tu mchod //
T02TD1223E:25b-37: aom raksha raksha h'u% h'u% h'u% phat /
T02TD1223E:25b-39: aom kha ram kh'a hi sv'a h'a /
T02TD1223E:25b-43: aom badzra gandhe h'u% dri'i sngags so //
T02TD1223E:25b-50: aom badzra nee bi dye h'u%/
T02TD1223E:25b-52: de nas sgra dang rol mo rnams //
T02TD1223E:25b-53: phul la rdzas rnams yang dag bsang //
T02TD1223E:25b-54: thog ma tha mar dgang gzar gyis //
T02TD1223E:25b-55: dbul bya gzhan du blugs gzar gyis //
T02TD1223E:25b-58: aom badzra ya dzny'a na ya sv'a h'a //
T02TD1223E:25b-60: aom sarba p'a bam da ha na badzra ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD1223E:26a-0: @26a * // til dang yungs kar rnams kyi'o //
T02TD1223E:26a-1: aom sarba sam pa de sv'a h'a /
T02TD1223E:26a-3: aom aa bra ti ha ta badzra ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD1223E:26a-5: aom badzra a'a yu she sv'a h'a /
T02TD1223E:26a-7: aom badzra ma h'a be g'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1223E:26a-9: aom badzra ghasma ri sv'a h'a /
T02TD1223E:26a-11: aom badzra bi dz'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1223E:26a-13: aom ma h'a ba l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1223E:26a-15: aom badzra pushta ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD1223E:26a-17: aom ma h'a shi ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1223E:26a-20: dz'a ti pha la rnams kyi'o //
T02TD1223E:26a-21: zhu ba'i rdzas rnams lhag ma ni //
T02TD1223E:26a-22: me lha'i sngags kyis sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD1223E:26a-23: aom bo dhi briksha ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD1223E:26a-25: aom badzra rta t'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1223E:26a-27: aom badzra sa ta ka r'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1223E:26a-30: til dang 'bras chan zho ni phyag / ku sha d'ur ba spyi gtsug tu'o //
T02TD1223E:26a-31: nas dang gro dang 'bras dang ni //
T02TD1223E:26a-33: zhu ba'i rdzas kyang zhal du'o //
T02TD1223E:26a-34: dri ni thugs kar me tog dbu //
T02TD1223E:26a-35: zhal bsil zhal la dbul bar bya //
T02TD1223E:26a-37: mar me mdun du dbul bar bya //
T02TD1223E:26a-38: de nas bsang gtor sbyin la bstod //
T02TD1223E:26a-39: h'um 'jig rten dbang phyug tshangs dbang mgon gyi sras //
T02TD1223E:26a-40: me lha'i rgyal po takkis dbang bskur ba //
T02TD1223E:26a-41: shes rab mchog gis nyon mongs thams cad bsreg /'dzin byed me lha nyid la rnam par 'dud //
T02TD1223E:26a-43: de nas bdud rtsi'ang 'bul byas la //
T02TD1223E:26a-44: las rnams bsgo bar bya ba'o //
T02TD1223E:26a-45: me lha'i dbang du byas pa'o //
T02TD1223E:26a-46: de nas me lha'i thugs kar ni //
T02TD1223E:26a-47: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor legs bsams la //
T02TD1223E:26a-48: der ni lha rnams bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD1223E:26a-49: de nas thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis //
T02TD1223E:26a-50: ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drang bya'o //
T02TD1223E:26a-51: bgegs bskrad bsang gtor mchod yon sbyin //
T02TD1223E:26a-52: dza:h'um bam ho: zhes brjod la /
T02TD1223E:26a-53: goo r'i la sogs bzhi pos ni //
T02TD1223E:26a-54: dgug gzhug bcings la dgyes pa bskyed //
T02TD1223E:26a-55: thugs ka'i sa bon 'od zer gyis //
T02TD1223E:26a-56: ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la //
T02TD1223E:26a-57: de yis dbang bskur legs par bya //
T02TD1223E:26a-59: lha rnams lce la h'um bkod de //
T02TD1223E:26a-60: sngon du gsungs pa'i rim gyis ni //
T02TD1223E:26a-61: mchod pa kun gyis rim bzhin mchod //
T02TD1223E:26b-0: khyad par bshad pa'i rdzas @26b rnams ni //
T02TD1223E:26b-1: ji ltar nus par bya ba'o //
T02TD1223E:26b-2: mthar ni dgang blugs phul nas ni //
T02TD1223E:26b-3: lha rnams gzi byin bskyed par bya //
T02TD1223E:26b-4: zhi la sngags kyi mtha' ru ni //
T02TD1223E:26b-5: sh'intam ku ru sv'a h'a btags //
T02TD1223E:26b-6: rgyas la sngags kyi mtha' ru ni //
T02TD1223E:26b-7: pushtim ku ru aom zhes gdags //
T02TD1223E:26b-8: dbang la sngags kyi mtha' ru ni //
T02TD1223E:26b-9: wa sham ku ru ho zhes gdags //
T02TD1223E:26b-10: dgug la sngags kyi mtha' ru ni //
T02TD1223E:26b-11: a'a k'arsha dang dza: gdags so //
T02TD1223E:26b-12: mngon spyod la ni sngags kyi mthar //
T02TD1223E:26b-13: m'a ra ya phat ces bya btags //
T02TD1223E:26b-14: de nas bsang gtor phul nas ni //
T02TD1223E:26b-15: bstod pa rnams kyis yang dag bstod //
T02TD1223E:26b-16: bdud rtsi myang ba'ang bya ba yin //
T02TD1223E:26b-17: dngos grub gang 'dod gsol gdab la //
T02TD1223E:26b-18: ye shes dkyil 'khor slar gshegs gsol //
T02TD1223E:26b-19: dam tshig lha rnams thugs kar bsdu //
T02TD1223E:26b-21: de nas bar chad nyer zhi'i phyir //
T02TD1223E:26b-22: aa k'a la sogs sngags kyis ni //
T02TD1223E:26b-23: phyogs skyong la sogs mgron rnams la //
T02TD1223E:26b-24: gtor ma 'bul bar byas nas kyang //
T02TD1223E:26b-25: rdzas rnams lhag ma me lha la //
T02TD1223E:26b-26: sngags kyis bsang nas rim bzhin du //
T02TD1223E:26b-27: bsang gtor mchod yon la sogs pa //
T02TD1223E:26b-28: so so'i sngags kyis dbul bar bya //
T02TD1223E:26b-29: dril bu rol mo'i sgra rnams dang //
T02TD1223E:26b-30: bstod pa'ang snga ma bzhin du bya //
T02TD1223E:26b-31: bdud rtsi myang ba'ang byas nas ni //
T02TD1223E:26b-32: ye shes me lha gshegs su gsol //
T02TD1223E:26b-33: aom aagna ye ya hi ya ti sva sarba tse b'a pa ra aartham tsas ti ham gatstsha ha bya bu ka /
T02TD1223E:26b-34: spyan drang ba yi chog las //
T02TD1223E:26b-35: mthe bong phyir bskyed slar gshegs pa'o //
T02TD1223E:26b-36: slar gshegs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1223E:26b-37: de nas dam tshig me lha ni //
T02TD1223E:26b-38: me yi gzugs su gyur par brtag / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo bya ste //
T02TD1223E:26b-39: ci bde bar ni gnas par bya'o //
T02TD1223E:26b-40: mkha' las char ba bab pa yis //
T02TD1223E:26b-41: rdo rje'i steng nas rtsa skyes ltar //
T02TD1223E:26b-42: slob dpon dag gi byin rlabs kyis //
T02TD1223E:26b-43: rtog ge bdag gis byas pa'o //
T02TD1223E:26b-44: sbyin sreg gi cho ga slob dpon mtsho skyes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//
